       <section class="component-magazine-subscribe magazine-subscribe-footer" data-reactid="469">
        <div class="magazine-img" data-reactid="470">
         <img class="subscribe-img" alt="" src="/images/self-starter-failsafe.jpg" height="136" width="100" data-reactid="471">
        </div>
        <div class="magazine-content" data-reactid="472">
         <h2 class="subscribe-hdr md-hed" data-reactid="473"><span class="top-hed"> NEW </span> SELF Meal Plans</h2>
         <p class="subscribe-dek" data-reactid="474">Easy-to-make Recipes. No Guesswork.</p>
         <div class="component-button sm-subscribe-link subscribe" data-reactid="475">
          <a href="https://www.self-starter.com/Join/Partner?pid=3111&amp;rnum=5" target="_blank" rel="" data-reactid="476">GET IT NOW</a>
